original_text: I gave my messages to the prophets. I showed them many visions. 12: A vision is like a dream but you might not be asleep. I used stories for the prophets to teach the people about me. I gave my messages to the prophets. I showed them many visions. 12: A vision is like a dream but you might not be asleep. I used stories for the prophets to teach the people about me. I gave my messages to the prophets. I showed them many visions. 12: A vision is like a dream but you might not be asleep. I used stories for the prophets to teach the people about me. I gave my messages to the prophets. I showed them many visions. 12: A vision is like a dream but you might not be asleep. I used stories for the prophets to teach the people about me. I gave my messages to the prophets.
korean_text: 내가 여러 선지자에게 말하였고 이상을 많이 보였으며 선지자들을 통하여 비유를 베풀었노라

sentences.original_text: I gave my messages to the prophets.
A vision is like a dream
but you might not be asleep.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신은 자고 있지 않을 수도 있다.

sentences.original_text: I used stories for the prophets
to teach the people about me.
